content:
What's the best way to browse historic topics in a stream? Is there a better way to see topics than in the sidebar, which abbreviates topics and in general isn't a great browsing experience? It also doesn't seem to have Keyboard navigation between topics..

I'm new to Zulip, and I want to catch up on old topics that were discussed before I joined.

There's a lot, but if you want easier to access lists, https://zulip-archive.rust-lang.org/ would be my recommendation - it should be a complete list pretty much and avoids some of the problems with Zulip UI when trying to look back
I guess that works. Not the greatest UI either, but at least not crammed into such a small area...
